name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
Results-driven Senior Azure Engineer with 8 years of experience specializing in **Azure**, **Linux**, **Kubernetes**, and **Docker** technologies in high-demand environments. Proficient in IT platform administration, change management, and monitoring, with a strong track record in SLA reporting and documentation. My problem-solving acumen is complemented by excellent customer interaction skills in both German and English.
As a seasoned Full Stack Developer, I bring a rich background in building high-performance solutions and a solid foundation in microservices architecture and CI/CD automation. I have effectively led enterprise-grade platform development leveraging **JavaScript**, **TypeScript**, **Python**, and **Flutter**. Additionally, my experience includes integrating AI/ML capabilities for predictive analytics and real-time data processing, utilizing tools such as **FastAPI**, **Django**, **MLflow**, **Airflow**, and **Kubeflow**. My deep understanding of cloud services with **Azure** and **AWS** positions me to contribute effectively in dynamic, compliance-focused environments.
